about.subtitle: About me
about.title: Nice to meet you, I'm Matheus
about.paragraph_1: I am 20 years old and graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from Unisanta, with a technical high school degree in Digital Games. I currently work as a Full-Stack developer at
about.paragraph_2: I am passionate about learning and constantly update myself with courses on Alura and other platforms.

timeline.title: Career
timeline.description: Follow the evolution of my career in technology, from my initial studies to my most recent professional experiences.

software_dev.title: Junior Software Developer
software_dev.description: Currently working at Yup Chat, where I am enhancing my Full-Stack development skills. I collaborate with multidisciplinary teams to create innovative and scalable technological solutions.

support.title: IT Support
support.description: Worked in IT support, solving technical issues, meeting user needs, and ensuring systems run smoothly. This experience gave me deeper understanding of end-user requirements.

college.title: Systems Analysis and Development
college.description: Completed my higher education in Systems Analysis and Development at Unisanta, where I gained solid knowledge in programming, databases, systems analysis, and software development methodologies.

internship.title: Intern
internship.description: Started my professional journey at Yup Chat as an intern, applying knowledge acquired in college and developing practical skills in a real business environment, participating in projects and learning from experienced professionals.

technical_course.title: Technical Course in Digital Games
technical_course.description: During high school, I attended a technical course in Digital Games at ETEC, where I had my first contact with programming and software development. This experience was fundamental in defining my path in technology.

skills.title: My Skills
